metadata.title: Skillwire — Professional Skills for Claude

howItWorksPage.title: How It Works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: From purchase to first use in under 5 minutes. No code required.
howItWorksPage.step1Desc: Browse the catalog, pick what you need, and pay once. No subscriptions, no recurring fees.
howItWorksPage.step2Desc: Immediately after payment, you’ll receive a download link via email. The ZIP contains everything: the skill files, documentation, and a quick-start guide.
howItWorksPage.step3Desc: Installation takes 30 seconds. The method depends on which Claude app you use.
howItWorksPage.step3MethodCodeDesc: Extract the ZIP into your .claude/skills/ folder. Done.
howItWorksPage.step3MethodDesktopDesc: Go to Settings → Features → Skills → Add. Upload the ZIP file — it contains the skill folder with SKILL.md and all supporting files. Done.
howItWorksPage.prereqClaude: Any Claude app: Claude Code, Claude Desktop, or claude.ai
howItWorksPage.prereqPlan: Any Claude plan — Free, Pro, Max, Team, or Enterprise
howItWorksPage.faq1A: Skills work in Claude Code (terminal/VS Code), Claude Desktop (macOS/Windows), claude.ai (web), and Claude Cowork. Same skill, any platform.
howItWorksPage.faq2Q: Do I need to know how to code?
howItWorksPage.faq2A: No. Skills work through natural language conversation with Claude. Just ask, and Claude uses the skill automatically.
howItWorksPage.faq3Q: What if Claude gets an update — will skills break?
howItWorksPage.faq3A: No. Skills are plain text files that Claude reads as instructions — they don’t depend on any specific Claude version. They work today and will keep working with future updates.
howItWorksPage.faq4Q: Can I modify a skill after buying it?
howItWorksPage.faq4A: Absolutely. Skills are plain text files (Markdown, Python). You own them and can customize anything.
howItWorksPage.installDesktopSteps:
1. Open Settings → Features → Skills
2. Click “Add”
3. Upload the ZIP file (it contains the skill folder with SKILL.md and all subfolders)
4. The skill appears in your list — ready to use

whatAreSkillsPage.title: What Are Claude Skills?
whatAreSkillsPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know before your first purchase.
whatAreSkillsPage.claudeCodeP1: Claude skills work across the entire Claude ecosystem. Whether you use Claude Code in your terminal, Claude Desktop on macOS or Windows, claude.ai in your browser, or Claude Cowork for autonomous tasks — your skills work everywhere.
whatAreSkillsPage.claudeCodeP2: Skills are plain text files that live in your .claude/skills/ folder. Every Claude app reads them automatically. Install once, use anywhere.
whatAreSkillsPage.claudeCodeP3: Skills are available on all Claude plans, including Free, Pro, Max, Team, and Enterprise.
whatAreSkillsPage.whatIsSkillP1: A skill is a structured knowledge package that gives Claude a new capability.
whatAreSkillsPage.whatIsSkillP2: Claude out of the box is a brilliant generalist. It can write code, answer questions, and help with many tasks. But it doesn’t know your specific sales methodology. It doesn’t have an evidence-based career coaching framework. It can’t create n8n workflows using best practices from 1,500 real templates.
whatAreSkillsPage.whatIsSkillP3: A skill changes that. When you install a skill, you’re giving Claude specialized knowledge and structured workflows that transform it from a generalist into a domain expert.
whatAreSkillsPage.whatIsSkillAnalogy: Skills are to Claude what apps are to your smartphone. Your phone can do a lot out of the box — but the apps are what make it indispensable.
whatAreSkillsPage.whatsInsideP1: A professional skill is not a single prompt. It’s an entire system. Here’s what you typically find inside:
whatAreSkillsPage.whatsInsideP2: The SKILL.md file is what Claude reads to understand its new capability. The references/ folder contains the domain knowledge. The scripts/ folder has executable tools. Together, they create a complete working system — not a one-shot prompt.
whatAreSkillsPage.benefit1Desc: Without a skill, asking Claude to “qualify this deal” gives different results each time. With a sales skill, it uses a structured scoring framework — same methodology, every time.
whatAreSkillsPage.benefit2Desc: The Vera Career Coach skill contains 6 evidence-based assessments backed by academic research. You get coaching methodology that would cost €200/session from a human coach.
whatAreSkillsPage.benefit3Desc: Install a skill in 30 seconds. No training, no onboarding, no learning curve. Just mention the skill and Claude knows what to do.
whatAreSkillsPage.installStep1Desc: After purchase, you receive a ZIP file via email. Save it anywhere on your computer.
whatAreSkillsPage.installStep2Code: Claude Code: extract to the skills folder
whatAreSkillsPage.installStep2Desktop: Claude Desktop / claude.ai: add via Settings
whatAreSkillsPage.installStep2DesktopDesc: Open Settings → Features → Skills → click “Add” and upload the ZIP file. It contains the skill folder with SKILL.md and all supporting subfolders. The skill appears in your list immediately.
whatAreSkillsPage.installStep3Desc: Mention the skill by name in your conversation, and Claude will use it automatically. No restart required.
whatAreSkillsPage.prereqClaudeSub: Any Claude plan (Free, Pro, Max, Team, Enterprise)
whatAreSkillsPage.prereqClaudeCode: Any Claude app: Claude Code, Claude Desktop, or claude.ai
whatAreSkillsPage.prereqInternet: Internet connection (for Claude API calls; skills are local files)
whatAreSkillsPage.faq1A: Claude Code, Claude Desktop, claude.ai, and Claude Cowork. Skills are plain text files that work across all platforms.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq2Q: Do I need to know how to code?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq2A: No. Skills work through natural language conversation with Claude.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq3Q: What if Claude gets an update — will skills break?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq3A: No. Skills are plain text files that Claude reads as instructions — they don’t depend on any specific Claude version. They work today and will keep working with future updates.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq4Q: Can I modify a skill after buying it?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq4A: Absolutely. Skills are plain text files (Markdown, Python). You own them and can customize anything.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq5Q: How is this different from a ChatGPT prompt?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq5A: A prompt is a single instruction. A skill is a complete system with methodology, knowledge base, templates, and scripts — typically 10–100 files.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq6A: Skills are digital products delivered instantly. Due to their nature, all sales are final. We recommend reading the skill detail page carefully before purchasing.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq7Q: Do I get updates when new versions are released?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq7A: Each skill has a version number and a public changelog. When we release a new version with improvements and new features, it will be available in the catalog.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq8Q: Can I use one skill on multiple computers?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq8A: Yes. Your license is per-person, not per-device. Install on as many of your own machines as you need.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq9Q: What happens if I lose the ZIP file?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq9A: Contact support and we’ll resend the download link.
whatAreSkillsPage.faq10Q: Are skills in English or Italian?
whatAreSkillsPage.faq10A: Skills are written in English by default. Claude will interact with you in your preferred language regardless — the skill’s knowledge is language-independent.

aboutPage.title: About Skillwire
aboutPage.subtitle: Built by a practitioner, not a prompt factory.
aboutPage.creatorRole: Sales & GTM Leader at iSquared (Var Group)
aboutPage.creatorBio1: I’m a B2B sales professional and AI practitioner who uses Claude every day. Not as a side project — as my primary work tool. From qualifying enterprise deals to coaching career transitions to automating content pipelines, Claude is at the center of my workflow.
aboutPage.creatorBio2: I built 25+ skills for my own use before realizing they could help others. Each skill on Skillwire is something I use in production — battle-tested in real sales negotiations, real coaching sessions, and real automation workflows.
aboutPage.creatorBio3: Skillwire exists because I believe the gap between AI’s potential and what most people actually get from it comes down to one thing: structured knowledge. A good skill turns Claude from a clever chatbot into a domain expert.
aboutPage.whyP1: Most Claude users interact with a brilliant generalist. They get good answers, but not great ones. Not consistent ones. Not methodology-driven ones.
aboutPage.whyP2: Skills change that. They give Claude the structured frameworks, domain knowledge, and validated workflows that turn generic responses into professional-grade output.
aboutPage.whyP3: I created Skillwire to be the place where professionals find skills they can trust — skills built by someone who actually uses them, not generated by a prompt factory.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.s1P1: By accessing or using the Skillwire website (skillwire.ai) and purchasing any products, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
termsPage.s1P2: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
termsPage.s2P1: "Skillwire" refers to the website skillwire.ai, operated by Alessandro Di Grazia.
termsPage.s2P2: "Skills" refers to the digital products sold on Skillwire, consisting of structured knowledge packages (ZIP files containing Markdown, Python, and other text files) designed for use with Claude by Anthropic.
termsPage.s2P3: "Merchant of Record" refers to Whop (Whop Marketplace, Inc.), which handles all payment processing, tax collection, and financial compliance on behalf of Skillwire.
termsPage.s2P4: "User" refers to any person who accesses the Skillwire website or purchases a product.
termsPage.s3P1: All products sold on Skillwire are digital goods. Each skill is delivered as a ZIP file containing text-based files (Markdown, Python, and configuration files).
termsPage.s3P2: Delivery is immediate. After a successful purchase, you will receive a download link via email. There is no physical shipment involved.
termsPage.s4P1: All payments are processed by Whop, our Merchant of Record. Whop handles payment processing, currency conversion, invoicing, and tax compliance.
termsPage.s4P2: All prices are displayed in EUR and are inclusive of applicable VAT or sales tax. Tax is handled by Whop, our Merchant of Record, based on your location.
termsPage.s4P3: Skillwire does not store any payment information. All financial transactions are handled entirely by Whop.
termsPage.s5P1: Each purchase grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the skill for your own professional or personal purposes.
termsPage.s5P2: The license is per-person, not per-device. You may install and use the skill on as many of your own devices as needed.
termsPage.s5P3: You may modify the skill files for your personal use. However, you may not redistribute, resell, sublicense, or share the skill files (modified or unmodified) with third parties.
termsPage.s6P1: All skills sold on Skillwire are the intellectual property of Skillwire and/or their respective creators. Your purchase grants a usage license, not ownership of the intellectual property.
termsPage.s6P2: The Skillwire name, logo, and website design are proprietary. You may not use them without prior written authorization.
termsPage.s7P1: Skills are provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. Skillwire does not guarantee that any skill will produce specific results, be error-free, or be suitable for your particular use case.
termsPage.s7P2: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Skillwire shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our products.
termsPage.s8P1: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Italian Republic.
termsPage.s8P2: Any disputes arising from or related to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts in Italy.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.s1P1: Skillwire (skillwire.ai) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacyPage.s1P2: This policy applies to all visitors and customers of the Skillwire website.
privacyPage.s2P1: The data controller for the purposes of GDPR is Alessandro Di Grazia. For any privacy-related inquiries, you can reach us at hello@skillwire.ai.
privacyPage.s3P1: Purchase information: When you buy a skill, your email address and payment details are collected and processed by Whop (our Merchant of Record). Skillwire does not directly collect or store payment card information.
privacyPage.s3P2: Analytics data: We use Vercel Analytics to collect anonymized usage data such as page views and general traffic patterns. This data does not identify individual users.
privacyPage.s3P3: We do not use tracking cookies. We do not collect personal data beyond what is necessary for order fulfillment and basic website analytics.
privacyPage.s4P1: Order fulfillment: Your email address is used to deliver download links and license keys after purchase.
privacyPage.s4P2: Customer support: If you contact us, we use your information to respond to your inquiries and resolve issues.
privacyPage.s4P3: Product improvement: Anonymized analytics data helps us understand how visitors use our website so we can improve the experience.
privacyPage.s5P1: Whop (payments): Processes all transactions, collects payment and billing information, and handles VAT compliance. See Whop's privacy policy for details.
privacyPage.s5P2: Vercel (hosting): Hosts the Skillwire website and provides anonymized analytics. See Vercel's privacy policy for details.
privacyPage.s5P3: Cloudflare (DNS and security): Provides DNS resolution and DDoS protection. See Cloudflare's privacy policy for details.
privacyPage.s6P1: As an EU/EEA resident, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacyPage.s6P2: Right of access: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacyPage.s6P3: Right to rectification: You can ask us to correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacyPage.s6P4: Right to erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
privacyPage.s6P5: Right to data portability: You can request your data in a structured, commonly used format.
privacyPage.s6P6: Right to restriction: You can ask us to limit the processing of your data.
privacyPage.s6P7: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data for specific purposes.
privacyPage.s6P8: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at hello@skillwire.ai. We will respond within 30 days.
privacyPage.s7P1: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, including order fulfillment and legal obligations.
privacyPage.s7P2: You may request deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us at hello@skillwire.ai.
privacyPage.s8P1: For any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at hello@skillwire.ai.

refundPage.title: Refund Policy
refundPage.s1P1: All products sold on Skillwire are digital goods delivered immediately after purchase via email download link. Due to the instant-delivery nature of digital products, all sales are generally considered final.
refundPage.s1P2: We encourage you to read the skill detail page carefully, including the description, specifications, and FAQ sections, before making a purchase.
refundPage.s2P1: We understand that issues can occur. We will consider a refund in the following circumstances:
refundPage.s2P2: Duplicate purchase: You were charged more than once for the same product.
refundPage.s2P3: Technical issue: A technical problem prevented you from downloading the product, and we were unable to resolve it.
refundPage.s2P4: Wrong product delivered: You received a different product than what you ordered.
refundPage.s3P1: To request a refund, email hello@skillwire.ai within 14 days of your purchase.
refundPage.s3P2: Please include your order number (from the Whop confirmation email), the product name, and a brief description of the issue.
refundPage.s4P1: Approved refunds are processed by Whop, our Merchant of Record. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.
refundPage.s4P2: Please allow 5 to 10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your bank or payment provider.
refundPage.s5P1: For any questions about refunds or your order, contact us at hello@skillwire.ai.

disclaimerPage.title: Disclaimer
disclaimerPage.s1P1: The skills sold on Skillwire are educational and productivity tools designed to enhance your use of Claude by Anthropic. Results may vary depending on your use case, configuration, and how you interact with the AI.
disclaimerPage.s1P2: Skillwire does not guarantee specific outcomes, revenue increases, or productivity gains from the use of any skill.
disclaimerPage.s2P1: Skills are not a substitute for professional advice. Nothing provided through Skillwire or its products constitutes legal, financial, medical, or other professional advice.
disclaimerPage.s2P2: If you require professional guidance, please consult a qualified professional in the relevant field.
disclaimerPage.s3P1: Skillwire skills are designed to work with Claude by Anthropic. Skillwire is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or responsible for Anthropic, Claude, or any other third-party platform.
disclaimerPage.s3P2: We are not responsible for changes, outages, or limitations of third-party services such as Claude, Whop, or any other platform that may affect the functionality of our products.
disclaimerPage.s4P1: We make every effort to ensure that our skills are accurate, well-structured, and functional. However, we make no warranties regarding the completeness, reliability, or suitability of any skill for a particular purpose.
disclaimerPage.s4P2: Skills are provided "as is." Users are responsible for evaluating whether a skill meets their needs before and after purchase.
disclaimerPage.s5P1: We may update this disclaimer from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
disclaimerPage.s5P2: Continued use of Skillwire after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the revised disclaimer.

retrieve.noResults: No purchases found for this email. Make sure you're using the same email used during checkout.
